Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video shows the helicopter crash that killed Kobe Bryant.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the content of the video by wrongly giving viewers the impression that it shows footage of the accident as it happened.
Falters at times: The claim falters by misrepresenting that it shows the crash that killed Bryant and his daughter, as well as seven others.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is contradicted by credible news photos, eyewitness accounts, and information about the actual crash.
Problematic assumption: No evidence of a problematic assumption bias.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim suggests an alternative explanation that the footage may show a helicopter crash in the Grand Canyon.
